item.description:
Our first event was held in June and went very well - in July we look forward to our second meet-up!

Vous etes bienvenue chez moi ou on vas boire une verre, grignotte (un petit peu), et bavarde ensemble!

If you came to the first event, the venue is unchanged, if not, I will provide the address closer to the event.

A tres bientot!

group.name: The Boston Metrowest French Language Meetup

item.name: Banlieu-Oest French Meet-up - July
